product_name: Trigger Point Performance Cool Point Hand Cooler
long_description: Keep your body temperature regulated while logging miles on the track or trail with the Cool Point hand cooler from Trigger Point Performance. Place palm cooling device in the freezer for 4 hrs. or until the gel is frozen; hold device in palm of hand and tighten strap until it stays in place without holding it. Cooling the hand stimulates thermoregulation signals to the brain, delaying fatigue and improving athletic performance. Soft nylon/polyester fabric is comfortable against the skin. Rip-and-stick strap keeps the Trigger Point Performance Cool Point hand cooler in place.
short_description: Keep your body temperature regulated while logging miles on the track or trail with the Cool Point hand cooler from Trigger Point Performance.
